name: Below The Beacon
description:
Below The Beacon is a heavily stylised horror game. The game consists of three levels that combine to make the game about ten minuets long. 

Story

You travel to a harbour town to search for your missing friend but things quickly spiral into madness.

Controls

WASD to Move

Spacebar to jump

Mouse to Look around

Mouse Wheel to Zoom In/Out

E to interact with Keys/Lantern
